member.name: D3D12_ELEMENTS_LAYOUT
member.summary: Describes how the locations of elements are identified.

member.name: D3D12_ELEMENTS_LAYOUT.D3D12_ELEMENTS_LAYOUT_ARRAY
member.summary: For a data set of n elements, the pointer parameter points to the start of n elements in memory.

member.name: D3D12_ELEMENTS_LAYOUT.D3D12_ELEMENTS_LAYOUT_ARRAY_OF_POINTERS
member.summary: For a data set of n elements, the pointer parameter points to an array of n pointers in memory, each pointing to an individual element of the set.
